rules_text:
{T}: Target player mills two cards.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a library has nine or fewer cards in it, you may transform Seeker of Pasts.
rules_text2:
Ward–Mill nine cards. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player mills nine cards.)[/i]
When this creature transforms into Etli, God of Yesterdays and at the beginning of your upkeep, exile target card from a graveyard. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may play it, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
